languages.text: "Справедливо, ублюдок что ни на есть, Ваш Вашество. Да только я еще и этот — посол! К вам с особой миссией пожаловал, убивать не советую".

traits.locale_text: "Справедливо, ублюдок что ни на есть, Ваш Вашество. Да только я еще и этот — посол! К вам с особой миссией пожаловал, убивать не советую".

languages.text: "Right enough, I am a scoundrel, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}. But I'm also an envoy! I've come to you with a special mission, so I wouldn't kill me if I was you."
languages.original_text: "Справедливо, ублюдок что ни на есть, Ваш Вашество. Да только я еще и этот — посол! К вам с особой миссией пожаловал, убивать не советую".

traits.locale_text: "Right enough, I am a scoundrel, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}. But I'm also an envoy! I've come to you with a special mission, so I wouldn't kill me if I was you."
"Right enough, I am a scoundrel, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}. But I'm also an envoy! I've come to you with a special mission, so I wouldn't kill me if I was you."
"Right enough, I am a scoundrel, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}. But I'm also an envoy! I've come to you with a special mission, so I wouldn't kill me if I was you."
"Right enough, I am a scoundrel, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}. But I'm also an envoy! I've come to you with a special mission, so I wouldn't kill me if I was you."

languages.text: “你说得没错，大人，我就是个无赖。话虽这么说，我好歹也是个特使！我是带着特别的使命来找你的。如果我是你的话，我就不会杀了这个人。”
languages.original_text: "Right enough, I am a scoundrel, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}. But I'm also an envoy! I've come to you with a special mission, so I wouldn't kill me if I was you."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，大人，我就是个无赖。话虽这么说，我好歹也是个特使！我是带着特别的使命来找你的。如果我是你的话，我就不会杀了这个人。”

languages.text: «Si bien es cierto que soy un rufián, mi{mf|lord|lady}, también soy un emisario en misión especial, así que yo en su lugar no me mataría».
languages.original_text: "Right enough, I am a scoundrel, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}. But I'm also an envoy! I've come to you with a special mission, so I wouldn't kill me if I was you."

traits.locale_text: «Si bien es cierto que soy un rufián, mi{mf|lord|lady}, también soy un emisario en misión especial, así que yo en su lugar no me mataría».

languages.text: 「そりゃそうだ、俺は悪党だからな、陛下様。だが、使節でもある！俺は特別な任務を背負ってきたんだ、俺がお前の立場なら殺さないぜ」
languages.original_text: "Right enough, I am a scoundrel, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}. But I'm also an envoy! I've come to you with a special mission, so I wouldn't kill me if I was you."

traits.locale_text: 「そりゃそうだ、俺は悪党だからな、陛下様。だが、使節でもある！俺は特別な任務を背負ってきたんだ、俺がお前の立場なら殺さないぜ」

languages.text: « C'est vrai que je suis une crapule, Votre Seigneurité, mais aussi un émissaire ! J'ai une mission spéciale à vous proposer, alors j'éviterais de me tuer, si j'étais vous. »
languages.original_text: "Right enough, I am a scoundrel, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}. But I'm also an envoy! I've come to you with a special mission, so I wouldn't kill me if I was you."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai que je suis une crapule, Votre Seigneurité, mais aussi un émissaire ! J'ai une mission spéciale à vous proposer, alors j'éviterais de me tuer, si j'étais vous. »

languages.text: "Völlig richtig, ich bin ein Schurke, Eure {mf|Lordheit|Ladyheit}. Aber ich bin auch ein Gesandter! Ich komme mit einer speziellen Mission zu Euch, ich würde mich an Eurer Stelle also nicht töten."
languages.original_text: "Right enough, I am a scoundrel, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}. But I'm also an envoy! I've come to you with a special mission, so I wouldn't kill me if I was you."

traits.locale_text: "Völlig richtig, ich bin ein Schurke, Eure {mf|Lordheit|Ladyheit}. Aber ich bin auch ein Gesandter! Ich komme mit einer speziellen Mission zu Euch, ich würde mich an Eurer Stelle also nicht töten."

languages.text: "Hakkınız var {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, alçağım ben! Ama elçiyim! Elimde size özel bir vazife var, yerinizde olsam beni öldürmezdim."
languages.original_text: "Right enough, I am a scoundrel, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}. But I'm also an envoy! I've come to you with a special mission, so I wouldn't kill me if I was you."
